sentence.Network_en: He thought oftener of O'Brien, with a flickering hope.
sentence.Network_cn: 他倒常常想到奥勃良, 怀着一线希望.

sentence.Network_en: A difference of color in the stars - oftener read of than seen in England - was really perceptible here.
sentence.Network_cn: 经常能在英国书本上读到的,但却不易目睹的繁星异彩在这里一眼就能看到.

sentence.Network_en: The oftener you smile, the more people will be drawn.
sentence.Network_cn: 你越是经常微笑, 就会吸引越多的人(draw).

list.abs: an Er , I often take the bus of blue and green ., 在首尔 , 我经常乘坐蓝色和绿色的公共汽车.
at the beautiful and lonely figure , I often can not take your eyes off ., 望着那美丽而寂寞的身影 , 我常常无法移开视线.
what do they often ask him ., 他们经常问他什么.
初三英语单词表_爱问知识人 ... adj.47.enough 充足的;充分的 1. how often 多久一次 6.shop. 购物v.
新起点英语五年级下册单词表_百度文库 ... sometimes 有时 how often 多久 every day 每天.

auth_sentence.content: Peevishness...is much oftener...the child of vanity and nursling of ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Peevishness...is much oftener...the child of vanity and nursling of ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Peevishness...is much oftener...the child of vanity and nursling of ignorance.

auth_sentence.content: Men, in the pursuit of wealth, consider their own gratification oftener than the gratification of others.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men, in the pursuit of wealth, consider their own gratification oftener than the gratification of others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men, in the pursuit of wealth, consider their own gratification oftener than the gratification of others.
